name: black-box-architecture
description: Eskil Steenberg's black box architecture principles for building modular, maintainable software. Optimized prompts for refactoring, planning, and debugging.
author: Community (based on Eskil Steenberg's principles)

refactor.name: Refactor with Black Box Principles
refactor.description: Analyze and refactor code into modular, replaceable black box components

plan.name: Plan System Architecture
plan.description: Design strategic architecture with black box module boundaries

debug.name: Debug with Modular Isolation
debug.description: Systematically debug using black box boundary analysis
